translations.DISCONTINUED_DUE_TO_LOW_SALE_FIGURES: Discontinued due to low sale figures
translations.THIS_NAME_IS_ALREADY_TAKEN_PLEASE_ENTER_: This name is already taken. Please enter a different name.
translations.TO_CREATE_A_GAME_YOU_NEED_TO_ENABLE_ONE_: To create a game, you need to enable one these features
translations.LACK_OF_NECESSARY_SKILLS_IN_THE_TEAM_CAN: Lack of necessary skills in the team can significantly slow down project development.
translations.DUE_TO_CONTRACT_AGREEMENT_WITH_THE_PUBLI: Due to contract agreement with the Publisher, You can't discontinue the game. only the publisher can.
translations.THIS_GAME_WILL_BE_SOON_DISCONTINUED_DUE_: This game will be soon discontinued due to low sale figures.
translations.BEST_SELLING_GAMES_OF_ALL_TIME_INCLUDES_: Best Selling Games of All Time (Includes All Platforms)
translations.NUMBER_OF_ADVERTISING_SLOTS_TO_BUY: Number of Advertising Slots to Buy
translations.AUTHOR: Author
translations.ARE_YOU_CERTAIN_YOU_WANT_TO_DELETE: Are you certain you want to delete
translations.COMPANY_DESCRIPTION: Founded in {FOUNDING_DATE} by {CHARACTER_NAME}, {COMPANY_NAME} is a game studio headquartered in {LOCATION}.
translations.THIS_SAVE_ALREADY_EXISTS_DO_YOU_WANT_TO_: This save already exists, do you want to overwrite it?
translations.SCENARIO_1_DESCRIPTION:
In the year 1978, you and your former colleagues from {COMPANY1} find yourselves yearning for more. Inspired by the groundbreaking success of {COMPANY2}, you decide to break free from the corporate mold. Armed with {FUNDING} in funding from {COMPANY3}, you embark on an audacious journey.
 Your mission? To forge a new path in the tech industry. You establish a fledgling game development company, with a vision as vast as the California sky. Your headquarters, a modest office space bathed in sunlight, sits just a stone’s throw away from the iconic {COMPANY1} campus in Sunny Vale.
 As the founder and CEO, you’ll navigate the treacherous waters of creativity, innovation, and competition. Will you pioneer groundbreaking games, revolutionize the industry, and leave an indelible mark on gaming history? The fate of your company rests in your hands.
translations.THE_CURRENT_LIST_OF_FEATURES_IS_NOT_COMP: The current list of features is not compatible with the platform specifications.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_UI: Graphical elements and controls that players interact with.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_STORYLINE: Plot and narrative that drives the game's progression.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_DYNAMIC_WEATHER: Realistic weather changes that affect gameplay and visuals.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_COLOR: Introduction of color visuals to enhance graphical representation.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_COLOR_DITHERING: A technique for creating the illusion of more colors.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_FIXED_CAMERA: In fixed camera games, the view stays locked in specific positions.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_TOP_DOWN_VIEW: Top-down perspective for game visuals and mechanics.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_ISOMETRIC_VIEW: Isometric perspective for visual representation in games.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_FIRST_PERSON_VIEW: First-person perspective for immersive player experience.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_LIGHTMAPS: Lightmaps are pre-baked lighting info on textures, creating static light and shadow in a game world.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_DYNAMIC_LIGHTING: Real-time lighting effects that enhance visual realism.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_BILLBOARDING: A technique where a 2D image of an object (often a character) is always facing the camera, regardless of its angle. This created a more visually appealing representation of 3D objects.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_PARTICLE_SYSTEM: Creates numerous tiny objects that move and interact, simulating effects like fire, smoke, or explosions.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_ANIMATION_SYSTEM: Brings characters and objects to life by smoothly transitioning between different frames over time.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_SOUND_DESIGN: Music,sound effects,and audio elements that enhance the gaming experience.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_MULTIPLAYER: Ability for players to engage with each other in the same game world.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_CHARACTER_CUSTOMIZAT: Players can personalize and modify their in-game characters.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_WORLD_INTERACTION: Players can interact with objects and elements in the game world.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_CINEMATIC_CUTSCENES: High-quality cinematic sequences that advance the story.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_PROCEDURAL_GENERATIO: Using algorithms to create game content dynamically.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_COLLISION_DETECTION: Checks if game objects bump into each other, triggering actions like bouncing or damage.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_BASIC_KINEMATICS: Calculates how objects move with factors like speed, direction, and acceleration, for a more natural feel.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_3D_PHYSICS: Applies physics simulations in a 3D space, allowing objects to interact and move realistically within a 3D world.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_BASIC_FLUID_DYNAMICS: Simulates the flow of fluids in a simplified way, often for visual effects and immersion.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_STATE_MACHINES: A system that controls an entity's behavior by switching between pre-defined states (e.g., idle, attacking) based on triggers (e.g., player action).
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_SIMPLE_PATHFINDING: Enemies could navigate through the game world using basic algorithms to find a path towards the player
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_AI_OPPONENTS: Computer-controlled opponents with simulated intelligent behavior.
translations.FEATURE_DESCRIPTION_LEVEL_EDITOR: Tool for designing and creating game levels.
